channel.title: Hugo on NIH isn't a 4 letter word
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on NIH isn't a 4 letter word

item.title: Moving to Hugo
item.description: This is the first post of this blog. Not much here, just moving from medium publications to hugo. Honestly, I just have like 3 posts there which are all before this intro. Let’s see how this goes… I’ve also contributed a bit at Scotch.io A little something from one of my favorite speakers, Peter Bourgon on one of his talks Evolutionary Optimization with Go NIH (Not Invented Here) isn’t a 4-letter word.
